title: Have Any Unpopular (Non-Political) Opinons?
body:
What are some unpopular non-political opinions that you have? I'll start.

I don't like Jojo's Bizarre Adventure: Stardust Crusaders very much. Mostly because I don't find Jotaro Kujo to be a very compelling protagonist.

Also spicy food hurts and eating it is usually not worth the effort.
